name: Idyll
title: Solo Developer
shortDes: a persistent massive multiplayer online game set on an exceedingly small island
section1:
While playing with online functionality for a few projects, I had the idea of an incredibly tiny world that could allow for a ton of players to show up at anytime - that's how Idyll was born.

Idyll was (is?) a virtual world that allows players to destroy objects, get resources, build new things, and repeat.

It can be played alone, or with friends, but anytime someone jumps into Idyll they are on the same island with the same amount of resources - the server I wrote for this allows for a finite number of rocks, pieces of wood, etc, meaning that at some point, you will have to break things to make new things.
